alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 4:26PM EDT until July 12 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Piscataquis County in north central Maine... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ebeemee, or 8 miles northwest of Brownville Junction, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Ebeemee, Lake View Plantation, Brownville, Ebeemee Lake, Katahdin Iron Works and Williamsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
